captions.text:
- Dude! 
- Does no one ever knock?!
You are NOT going to believe this!
This is going to blow your mind!
Dollar store glasses. My mind is blown.
You don't get it! Try them on.
So this is what you came to gloat about:
What the heck?! That's some devil magic!
I know, right?! OH! This is so cool.

Now, we see what these bad boys can do!
(click)
They must have been in creative mode.

- Don't ever wink at me.
- Yeah, it felt weird.

- OH, THE BLOCKS!
- Wait, what--what'd you see?!
Hang on, dude. Wait, whoa, whoa
wait a minute, dude, I have an idea.

Give me those. (click)
I have the BEST idea.
Whoa, whoa! I don't have any armor!

(click)
I need you to make this...
If you enjoyed this video, and want to see more,
then, please, check out Matthias' channel!
He did pretty much everything on this video
AND he's got a special alternate ending
Just click on his lovely face.
A lot of work was put into this so, please,
share it with your friends and do whatever you can to spread the word!
And I will SEE YOU in the next video!
